name: Abi Kumar
title: Full Stack Developer & UI Designer
description: I craft immersive, scalable, and user-centric web experiences, blending sleek design with robust, high-performance code.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who I Am
about.description: I'm Abi Kumar, a passionate full-stack developer based in Noida, UP. My focus is on building interactive, performant, and visually appealing digital experiences. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I love bringing ideas to life, from the initial concept to a fully deployed application.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.description: A snapshot of the tools and technologies I use to build modern, robust, and scalable web applications.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the personal and academic projects I've worked on. Each project showcases my journey in learning and applying new technologies.

items.title: MagmaResumeAI
items.description: An AI-powered resume builder that helps users create professional resumes tailored to specific job descriptions using LLMs.

items.title: MagmaFitnessAI
items.description: A personalized fitness and nutrition planner that generates workout routines and diet plans based on user goals and preferences.

items.title: Personal Portfolio
items.description: My personal developer portfolio, designed with a dark neon aesthetic and built with Next.js for high performance.

items.title: Idea Catcher Workflow
items.description: An automation workflow using n8n to capture ideas from multiple sources and organize them into a centralized Google Sheet.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm currently open to new opportunities and collaborations. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out. My inbox is always open!
